CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 10, 1962, pg. 13, reads: "Re-Elected - First District Legislature [Legislator] K. Leroy Irvis is shown casting his vote at the beginning of Tuesday's election day."Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1962, pg. 21, reads: "Key Man - K. Leroy Irvis, state assemblyman of the First Legislative District of Allegheny County, has been elected caucus chairman of the Democratic side of the House of Representatives and thereby holds a key position in Democratic Party policy making."
TitMainTitle: K. Leroy Irvis standing in voting booth for 15th District of Fifth Ward, Pittsburgh
